skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the norman way
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Talk to the Norman Way Alexa skill to learn about the sites found along the Norman Way route that runs along the south coast of Wexford in Ireland. You can even take a quiz about the Normans in Wexford to test your knowledge!

The Norman Way Alexa skill is a fun way for all the family to begin learning about the Norman history of Ireland. Wexford is a beautiful part of Ireland's Ancient East and is where the Norman story in Ireland began. The sites waiting to be discovered along the Norman Way range from medieval abbeys and castles that are hundreds of years old to the oldest operational lighthouse in the world, to the beaches where Norman knights first set foot on Irish soil way back in 1169. 

If you enjoy using the Norman Way Alexa skill, please leave it a rating here on Amazon. This really helps other families, Irish history enthusiasts, tourists and cyclists to discover the Norman Way.

The Norman Way is a member of the Wexford Heritage Trail, one of the Wexford Trails. The Norman Way is a Wexford County Council project which has been part-funded by Fáilte Ireland.

Thanks for checking out the Norman Way!
